name: Hospes Palacio de los Patos

reviews.text: This truly was an oasis in the strong Andalusia heat! Stayed for two nights in the estate part of this lovely hotel... we didn't find the street noise overwhelming as the windows are triple protected. The entire staff was great and very helpful the rooms are kept spotless! The modernist decor is calming and adds to the total feel of relaxation! The whole hotel compound is a fabulous getaway! I wouldn't stay anywhere else!!
reviews.title: Wouldn't stay anywhere else!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed two nights in this hotel.
reviews.title: very nice hotel but...

likes.liked: — the old part of the hotel

reviews.text: Coming from its sister hotel in Cordoba the night before, we knew that matching the experience we had there would be tough.
reviews.title: A Luxurious experience
Great Hotel
reviews.text: The hotel is set into an old and remarkable one family house as well as in a new building just across the garden.

aka: Hospes Palacio De Los Patos Hotel
